Sept. 8, 1888 D Brighouse Contest
Brighouse Contest 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
brighouse-contest
None
Brighouse, West Yorkshire 1st prize £20. 2nd prize £12. 3rd prize £6. 4th prize £2.
March contest 1st (£2) Leeds Forge, 2nd (£1) Wyke Old.
6 bands competed.
Promoted by Brighouse Subscription Band - 1st contest held in Brighouse.
April 25, 2012, 12:56 p.m. May 18, 2019, 12:17 p.m.
